Text: Attn KSBJ VolunteersKSBJ Volunteers If you surf the net we need your help Our ticketing department is trying to compile a list of ticketing websites We need the following type of websites Christian Ticketing Companies Houston Area Ticketing CompaniesPlease check to make sure that they are a legitimate company and not scalpers Internet Ticketing Companies Also if you would like to volunteer for the Third Day Concert on March at Sugar Creek Baptist Church please let me know ASAP We need prayer volunteers merchandise volunteers and Security Volunteers We are also in need of volunteers for the upcoming brown bag concert with Nicole Nordeman this Tuesday February at Baybrook Mall and Wednesday February at Willowbrook Mall from ampm We are about to start an week project which starts on February We are in need of volunteers who are good communicators have a great personality and are able to come to the station for hrs once a week or every other week We are flexible The available time slots are amnoon pmpm pmpm pmpm I Thanks Charlotte Estrada Community Relations Assistant

Sharathon ReminderSharathon The dates for Sharathon are Thursday July Friday July and Saturday July Sharathon will begin at am on Thursday morning and will end on Saturday at midnight Please arrive Must be at least years oldPARAPARAPARA Tour Guide Give tours of the KSBJ studios ampmPARApmpm ampmPARApmpm ampmPARApmpmPARA Must be at least years oldPARA Frequently Asked Questions HOW DO I SIGN UP Fill out registration form below Can I bring my child with me during my volunteer time Unfortunately we do not have daycare So we ask that you do not bring your children with you If you have a teenager that is years old or older they will be able to work in the mail room but they must sign up Can our church group volunteer together Yes as long as space is provided So signup asap Do I have to signup before Sharathon or can I just show up You must signup ahead of time How long are the shifts Most shifts are hours long with the exception of the last shift on Saturday which is hours long We ask that you arrive minutes before you shift starts so you can be trained Can I volunteer in more than one area Yes as long as you signup for them before Sharathon When my volunteer time is over can I volunteer for another shift No due to limited space in our building However if you want to signup ahead of time for more than one shift you may Do I have to stay for the complete hours shift Yes we expect you to stay for the complete shift However we do want you to have an enjoyable experience So you will get refreshments and breaks when you need them Can my spouse and I volunteer together Yes as long as both of you sign up I have never volunteered before will there be training Yes We ask that you arrive minutes before your shift begins so that you may be trained Can I bring my spouse a family member or friend with me when I volunteer If they have not signedup to volunteer or if they are not going to volunteer during your shift we ask that you do not come with you due to limited space in our building I have volunteered for several Sharathons do I have to arrive early for training also Yes because there have been a few changes this year due to EFTElectronic Funds Transfer However if you would like to train others please let us know when you signup and we will have a special training session for you I am unable to make it to KSBJ can I volunteer from my home church or a different location No all Sharathon volunteers must come to the KSBJ studios However you can pray wherever you are at for the KSBJ staff volunteers and listeners Where do I go when I get to KSBJ Go in front doors of KSBJ signin at the front desk Put on a name tag A KSBJ employee will be there to instruct you where you need to go Where is KSBJ located KSBJ is located in Humble TX The address is Wilson Road Humble TX From Hwy take the Bush AirportWill Clayton Parkway Exit Go east on Will Clayton Parkway to the second light The second light is at the corner of Will Clayton Parkway and Wilson Road Make a left on Wilson Road KSBJ is located on Wilson Road on the right just pass the first light Sharathon Registration Form Name Date Submitted Daytime Phone Numbers Email address Schedule available to work Volunteer Duty If you have any questions please call Charlotte at ext or send email to

KSBJ Volunteer OpportunitiesHello Everyone I hope you are all doing well We will begin Giving Tree later this month Giving Tree is when we allow listeners to submit names of people who are in need Then we announce those needs on the air Listeners that can meet those needs call in and we match them up together Last year over families were helped We are in need of volunteers to help us with this project We need data entry volunteers and phone volunteers Volunteers are needed to volunteer hours a week for the duration of Giving Tree You can volunteer more than once a week if you would like to Please email or call me if you are able to be a Giving Tree Volunteer or if you have any questions about being a Giving Tree Volunteer Thanks Charlotte Estrada Community Relations Assistant ext Here is the Giving Tree Volunteer schedule Monday November data entry hours Wednesday November data entry hours Friday November data entry hours We would prefer to have the Monday or Wednesday volunteer come back on Friday instead of a new volunteer Monday Friday No volunteers on Sundays shifts are am am pm pm pm pm We need one volunteer to work during each time slot answering phones and light data entry work We need a second volunteer to work Mondays Wednesdays and Fridays doing data entry work only This person will need to work hours anytime during these days
